title: Sergei Mikhaylovich Puchkov
text:
Sergei Mikhaylovich Puchkov (; born 12 January 1985) is a Russian former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He also holds <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> citizenship as Serhiy Mykhaylovych Puchkov ().
Club career.
He started playing in the Ukrainian second and third tier in the <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Kyiv">FC Dynamo Kyiv</a> system.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> for <a href="FC%20Dolgoprudny">FC Dolgoprudny</a> on 20 April 2013 in a game against <a href="FC%20Karelia%20Petrozavodsk">FC Karelia Petrozavodsk</a>.
